pr_title: KEYCLOAK-12768: Prevent reserved characters in URLs

timeline.message: KEYCLOAK-12768: Prevent reserved characters in URLs
KEYCLOAK-12768: Prevent reserved characters in URLs

timeline.bodyText:
I think node is the hostname of a node, so an IP address or domain, with/without ports. So this would probably break things as ':' is marked as a reserved character.
@mposolda ??
timeline.author: stianst

replies.bodyText: Yes, it is hostname of a node, so an IP address or domain. However it is without ports. So this validation should be ok.
replies.author: mposolda

timeline.author: stianst

replies.bodyText: @stianst I guess it depends on what you want to happen if somehow "alias" is not a string.  That would be an error.  With a cast you get ClassCastException.  With toString(), you get unpredictable results.
replies.author: ssilvert
